function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close contact in congested areas may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak.","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures and hygiene protocols in densely populated spaces.","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems and air filtration systems.","People":"Residents, employees, and visitors in densely populated areas.","Owner":"Government authorities and building management."},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air quality may increase the risk of airborne disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of respiratory infections and disease spread through the air.","Mitigation":"Installing ventilation systems, air purifiers, and regular air quality monitoring.","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, and particulate matter sensors.","People":"Occupants of enclosed spaces and crowded indoor environments.","Owner":"Facility managers, property owners, and building maintenance staff."},{"Description":"Lack of natural elements and outdoor exposure may impact mental health and immune function.","Impact":"Reduced resilience to stress, lower mental well-being, and weakened immune response.","Mitigation":"Incorporating natural elements, green spaces, and access to outdoor environments in architectural design.","Technologies":"Biophilic design principles, green infrastructure, and nature-based building materials.","People":"Residents, workers, and occupants of built environments.","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and property developers."}]}
